price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើងបានបញ្ចុះគម្ពីរគួរអានជាភាសា អារ៉ាប់ ដើម្បីឱ្យពួកអ្នកស្វែងយល់។
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
